statements: DELETE FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND fuel_type = 'Diesel';
DELETE FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE emissions_rating > 3 AND fuel_consumption < 10.00;
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND consumption_date = '2022-07-15';
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND consumption_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE co_emissions > 100 AND emission_date < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM VehicleEmissions WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND emission_type = 'CO2'
DELETE FROM VehicleInformation WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND mileage > 500;
